headline: Boston Scientific (BSX) Is Considered a Good Investment by Brokers: Is That True?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Boston Scientific (BSX) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Boston Scientific (BSX) Surges 6.8%: Is This an Indication of Further Gains?
summary: Boston Scientific (BSX) witnessed a jump in share price last session on above-average trading volume. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions for the stock doesn't suggest further strength down the road.
